Uses of Class
io.permazen.PermazenFactory

  • Packages that use PermazenFactory 
    Package Description
    io.permazen
    Abstraction layer allowing access to a Database using normal Java objects.
    io.permazen.app
    Support for Permazen command line applications.

    • Uses of PermazenFactory in io.permazen

      Methods in io.permazen that return PermazenFactory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PermazenFactory PermazenFactory.setDatabase(Database database)
      Configure the underlying Database for this instance.
      PermazenFactory PermazenFactory.setModelClasses(Class<?>... modelClasses)
      Configure the Java model classes.
      PermazenFactory PermazenFactory.setModelClasses(Iterable<? extends Class<?>> modelClasses)
      Configure the Java model classes.
      PermazenFactory PermazenFactory.setSchemaVersion(int schemaVersion)
      Configure the schema version number associated with the configured Java model classes.
      PermazenFactory PermazenFactory.setStorageIdGenerator(StorageIdGenerator storageIdGenerator)
      Configure the StorageIdGenerator for auto-generating storage ID's when not explicitly specified in @PermazenType, @JField, etc., annotations.
      PermazenFactory PermazenFactory.setValidatorFactory(ValidatorFactory validatorFactory)
      Configure a custom ValidatorFactory used to create Validators for validation within transactions.

    • Uses of PermazenFactory in io.permazen.app

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PermazenFactory AbstractMain.getPermazenFactory(Database db)
